headline: LOGITECH PRECISION POLISHING JIG 3 INCH PSM
description: Precision Polishing Jig with Programmable Sample Monitor (PSM)
categories.lvl2: Surface Processing Equipment  >  Lapping Machines > Single Sided Lapper
specstable:
Manufacturer Logitech
Model PP5GT PSM
Description Jig -- 3 Inch Precision Polishing PSM
Other Information

The Logitech PSM Programmable Sample Monitor is a high precision sample monitoring facility designed for use with PP5 Precision Polishing Jigs. It provides an effective means for automatic processing of samples to a pre-determined programmed thickness. Due to the audible alarm feature on the PSM, which activates prior to completion of sample processing, and the optional infra-red cut-out, the unit can be left to run unsupervised – freeing the operator to perform additional tasks

Specifications:

Resolution:1µm
Full range accuracy (at 20°C):3µm over 25mm
Max allowable preset value: 999
Power Supply: Rechargeable battery
